**Example 1: 获取企业组织信息**



Input: 

```
tccli organization GetOrganization --cli-unfold-argument ```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "OrgId": 1,
        "HostUin": 1,
        "Nickname": "test",
        "Mail": "test@qq.com",
        "OrgType": 1,
        "IsEmpty": 1,
        "RequestId": "629cde15-2b9c-403b-b5f1-033992709327"
    }
}
```
